result.execSummary:
The defendant Marc David Henry was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Costs to be paid $50.00 per month commencing 10/03/2022 and each month thereafter on the 1st of each month or penalty of civil judgment for non-payment.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
All standard court costs and DNA surcharge are waived by the court.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marc David Henry

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

11:36 AM Defendant Marc David Henry in court.  Attorney Eryn M Menden in court for Marc David Henry.  Prosecuting attorney Patrick Ryan Campbell in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
There are no victim on this case. 

Defense requests to proceed to plea/sentencing hearing today. Court proceeds with plea/sentencing. 

Defense waives reading of amended information filed today. 

Defendant enters a guilty plea to all three counts of the Amended Information. Court conducts colloquy with the Defendant and finds them guilty of count #1, count #2, and count #3. 

State makes sentencing arguments. Defense makes sentencing arguments Defendant makes statements. 
Court orders the following:	

COUNT #1:
Costs:  $243.00
DNA Surcharge: $200.00
To be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month, starting 10/03/2022 and the 1st of every month until paid in full
Alternate: entry of civil judgment

COUNT #2:
COSTS: WAIVED BY COURT
DNA SURCHARGE: WAIVED BY COURT

COUNT #3:
COSTS: WAIVED BY COURT
DNA SURCHARGE: WAIVED BY COURT

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Effective August 1, 2022, this case is assigned to Branch 4, the Honorable Lloyd V. Carter, pursuant to 22-SO-04(67).
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

09:55 AM Defendant Marc David Henry in court with attorney Eryn M Menden.  Mary Caitlin Brejcha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waive reading of Information.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
